Ansible Contributor Summit, Durham 2023

by The Ansible Community Team - 29 Sep '23

Announcing Ansible Contributor Summit in Durham, as well as how to register and propose topics for the event. This is a full day working session especially for community contributors to interact with one another, as well as with Ansible development teams.
